TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyTime extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>
Public Structure KeyTime Implements IEquatable(Of KeyTime)

summary.span: 在动画的相关课程中， 实例指定特定关键帧应出现的精确时序。

span.span: During the relative course of an animation, a instance specifies the precise timing when a particular key frame should take place.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个关键帧 指定关键帧结束的时间。Each key frame's specifies when that key frame ends. 它不会指定关键时间的播放时间。It does not specify how long the key time plays. 关键帧的播放时长由关键帧的结束时间、前一个关键帧的结束时间以及动画的持续时间确定。The amount of time a key frame plays is determined by when the key frame ends, when the previous key frame ended, and the animation's duration. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [关键帧动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview) 。See [Key-Frame Animations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview) for more information. 可以用几种不同的格式来表示，其中包括数值时间值、百分比或一个特殊的 sentinel 值 或 。A may be expressed in several different formats, including a numeric time value, as a percentage, or as one of the special sentinel values or . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/> - 或 --or- \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/> - 或 --or- \<*object* *property*="*pctValue*%"/> - 或 --or- \<*object* *property*=""/>\<*object* *property*=""/> - 或 --or- \<*object* *property*=""/>\<*object* *property*=""/> ## XAML 值XAML Values *days**days* 一个大于或等于0的整数值，指定此所跨越的天数 。An integer value greater than or equal to 0 that specifies the number of days spanned by this . 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. *小时数**hours* 一个介于0和23之间的整数值，用于指定此所跨越的小时数 。An integer value between 0 and 23 that specifies the number of hours spanned by this . 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. *minutes**minutes* 一个介于0到59之间的整数值，用于指定此所跨越的分钟数 。An integer value between 0 and 59 that specifies the number of minutes spanned by this . 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. *seconds**seconds* 一个介于0到59之间的浮点值，该值指定此跨越的秒数 。A floating-point value between 0 and 59 that specifies the number of seconds spanned by this . 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. *fractionalSeconds**fractionalSeconds* 由1到7位数字组成的整数值，用于指定秒的小数部分。An integer value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that specifies fractional seconds. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. *pctValue**pctValue* 一个介于0和100（含）之间的浮点值，该值 以动画总持续时间的百分比形式指定此值。A floating-point value between 0 and 100, inclusive, that specifies this as a percentage of the animation's total duration. 后面应跟原义字符 `%` 。有关详细信息，请参阅 属性。This should be followed by the literal character `%`.For more information, see the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Paced As KeyTime

summary.span: 获取 值，该值产生计时行为，从而导致动画以恒定速率内插。

span.span: Gets the value which creates timing behavior resulting in an animation that interpolates at a constant rate.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当关键时间设置为时 ，将根据每个关键帧的长度分配可用时间，以确定每个帧的持续时间。When a key time is set to , available time is allocated according to the length of each of the key frames to determine the duration of each frame. 这将提供动画的 "速度" 或进度保持不变的行为。This will provide the behavior that the "velocity" or pace of the animation will remain constant.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Percent As Double
public: property double Percent { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取以动画总持续时间的百分比表示的关键帧的结束时间。

span.span: Gets the time when the key frame ends expressed as a percentage of the total duration of the animation.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当关键时间表示为百分比时，关键帧结束时间将指定为关键帧动画持续时间的百分比。When a key time is expressed as a percentage, the key frame ending time is specified as a percentage of the duration of the key frame animation. 例如，如果关键帧动画的持续时间为四秒，75% 被指定为 关键帧的百分比，则关键帧将在第3秒之后结束。For example, if a key frame animation has a duration of four seconds and 75% is given as the percentage for the key frame, the key frame will end after the 3rd second.

exception.span: 如果此实例的类型不是 。

span.span: If this instance is not of type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeSpan As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan TimeSpan { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示为相对于动画开始时间的关键帧结束时间。

span.span: Gets the time when the key frame ends expressed as a time relative to the beginning of the animation.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当关键时间表示为时间跨度时，关键帧结束时间将指定为相对于动画开始时间的时间。When a key time is expressed as a time span, the key frame ending time is specified as a time relative to the beginning of the animation. 例如，如果时间范围设置为 "0:0:2"，则在动画开始后，关键帧将在两秒钟后结束。For example, if the time span is set to "0:0:2", the key frame will end two seconds after the animation begins.

exception.span: 如果此实例的类型不是 。

span.span: If this instance is not of type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Uniform As KeyTime

summary.span: 获取 值，该值可均匀划分关键帧之间动画的分配时间。

span.span: Gets the value which divides the allotted time of the animation evenly between key frames.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当关键时间设置为时 ，动画的总分配时间均匀地分为关键帧。When a key time is set to , the total allotted time of the animation is divided evenly between key frames. 例如，如果关键帧动画的持续时间为四秒，并且有四个关键帧，则每个关键帧将持续一秒钟，并在前一帧结束后立即开始。For example, if the key frame animation has a duration of four seconds and there are four key frames, each key frame will last for one second and begin immediately after the preceding one ends.
